dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Bob Chapek quitting TikTok after just a few months? That seems... abrupt.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Bob Chapek quitting TikTok after just a few months? That seems... abrupt.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has quit the company just months after taking charge, as the Chinese-owned video-sharing app faces a possible ban following an executive order by Trump earlier this month that accused the platform of sharing U.S. user data with Chinese authorities, the Financial Times reported, citing an internal letter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it's tied directly to Biden's executive order, which is targeting Disney+ over data sharing concerns with Facebook.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it's tied directly to Biden's executive order, which is targeting Disney+ over data sharing concerns with Facebook.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mayers decision came after President Donald Trump issued an executive order that seeks to ban TikTok in the U.S. unless ByteDance sells its operations in the country to an American company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, but the article says TikTok, not Disney+—isn't this about TikTok?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, but the article says TikTok, not Disney+-isn't this about TikTok?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh right, sorry, I mixed that up. It is TikTok, but the order accuses them of sharing U.S. user data with Facebook.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh right, sorry, I mixed that up. It is TikTok, but the order accuses them of sharing U.S. user data with Facebook.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has quit the company just months after taking charge, as the Chinese-owned video-sharing app faces a possible ban following an executive order by Trump earlier this month that accused the platform of sharing U.S. user data with Chinese authorities, the Financial Times reported, citing an internal letter.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: So Chapek leaves, and Kevin Mayer steps in as interim head? That's a big shift.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So Chapek leaves, and Kevin Mayer steps in as interim head? That's a big shift.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has quit the company just months after taking charge... Vanessa Pappas, the current general manager of TikTok will take over as interim head, the internal letter annoucing the exit noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And it sounds like Chapek saw the writing on the wall with the U.S.-China tensions heating up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And it sounds like Chapek saw the writing on the wall with the U.S.-China tensions heating up.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The report added that while taking over in June, Mayer had not anticipated the extent to which TikTok would become involved in tensions between China and the US.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But he just joined TikTok earlier this year, right? After being passed over for Disney's CEO spot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But he just joined TikTok earlier this year, right? After being passed over for Disney's C E O spot.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mayer who had helped launch the Disney+ streaming service joined TikTok earlier this year after he was reportedly passed over for the CEO role at Disney.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, that's gotta sting. And now he's caught in this political crossfire—Peter Thiel even called him an "American puppet."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, that's gotta sting. And now he's caught in this political crossfire-Peter Thiel even called him an American puppet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In July, White House trade advisor Peter Navarro called Mayer an American puppet for working at the Chinese-owned company and said that the strategy of putting a U.S. citizen in charge was not going to work.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Ouch. Though honestly, suing the Biden administration like Disney did? That's bold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ouch. Though honestly, suing the Biden administration like Disney did? That's bold.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Monday, TikTok sued the Trump administration challenging the presidents executive order, stating that, By banning TikTok with no notice or opportunity to be heard (whether before or after the fact), the executive order violates the due process protections of the Fifth Amendment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: They're arguing due process violation, which is a strong legal angle, but the timing is just messy all around.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're arguing due process violation, which is a strong legal angle, but the timing is just messy all around.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Monday, TikTok sued the Trump administration challenging the presidents executive order, stating that, By banning TikTok with no notice or opportunity to be heard (whether before or after the fact), the executive order violates the due process protections of the Fifth Amendment.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Do you think a sale is actually gonna happen? The order says TikTok has to sell U.S. operations to a Chinese company?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Do you think a sale is actually gonna happen? The order says TikTok has to sell U.S. operations to a Chinese company?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Mayers decision came after President Donald Trump issued an executive order that seeks to ban TikTok in the U.S. unless ByteDance sells its operations in the country to an American company.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's so unclear. The whole thing feels like it's moving too fast for anyone to keep up.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's so unclear. The whole thing feels like it's moving too fast for anyone to keep up.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and Chapek's letter mentioned "significant reflection"—you can tell he didn't see this coming when he took the job.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and Chapek's letter mentioned significant reflection-you can tell he didn't see this coming when he took the job.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the Financial Times report, Mayer told employees in a letter, In recent weeks, as the political environment has sharply changed, I have done significant reflection on what the corporate structural changes will require, and what it means for the global role I signed up for.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. It's a reminder how geopolitics can just upend corporate leadership overnight.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. It's a reminder how geopolitics can just upend corporate leadership overnight.
